column5: If any Nanook owners out there need a new travel cover look for the Rapala M2 cover. Fits like glove, has better re-enforced corners and compression straps to tighten the middle section down. Clam cover at Sail was 70 bucks, the Rapala M2 was 44
Nice!  Only thing I do not like about my Nanook is the cover it came with.   It's basically garbage.
Rapala allegedly sold their covers for 44 clams.
